HeroPage.name: Andrey da Hora
HeroPage.description: Transforming complex ideas in digital elegantly experiences. React, Next.js and interface design especialist.

StickyCard.summary: Fullstack Developer and Designer passionate about creating immersive and performative digital experiences.

1.title: Espaço Cinthia França
1.description: Complete redesign of the digital presence, resulting in improved accessibility and search engine optimization (SEO) for the clinic.

2.title: Psiconnect
2.description: SaaS for online therapy. Scalable architecture with WebRTC for real-time video and scheduling management.

3.title: Rythym
3.description: Music streaming app with personalized playlists and AI-based recommendations.

4.title: Spooky House
4.description: A Halloween-themed e-commerce site developed as a project for a web development course at university.

5.title: MPJLOL BOT
5.description: A simple Discord bot for learning about the development process, made as a joke for a group of friends.

UNICID_ES.details: Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering, focusing on complex systems development and software architecture.

UNICID_ADS.details: Associate Degree in Systems Analysis and Development, focusing on programming, systems analysis, and web development.

SENAC.details: IT Technical Course, focusing on programming, networks, and technical support.

CULTURA.details: Currently studying English, focusing on communication and reading.

Psiconnect.res1: Leading the development of an online therapy platform, coordinating a team of 4 developers.
Psiconnect.res2: Implementation of video calling and scheduling features using Next.js and Node.js.
Psiconnect.res3: Collaboration with designers to create an intuitive and accessible user interface.
Psiconnect.res4: Ensuring compliance with data privacy regulations, such as LGPD and GDPR.
Psiconnect.res5: Application performance optimization, resulting in a 30% reduction in load time.

EspacoCinthia.res1: Development and maintenance of the institutional website using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
EspacoCinthia.res2: Implementation of SEO and accessibility practices to improve online visibility.
EspacoCinthia.res3: Collaboration with the design team to create an engaging user experience.

Teleperformance.res1: Providing tier 1 technical support for clients.
Teleperformance.res2: Assisting in the resolution of software and hardware-related issues.

ux_centric.title: User-Centric Design
ux_centric.description: I don't just write code, I build experiences. I focus on intuitive and accessible interfaces, ensuring technology solves real people's problems.

clean_code.title: Clean & Scalable Code
clean_code.description: I use modern architecture and strict typing to create software that is maintainable and ready to scale with the business.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Speed is a feature. I optimize every asset and render cycle to ensure high Lighthouse scores and better SEO rankings.

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Looks like you got lost in cyberspace. The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

footer.text: Made with Next.js, Framer Motion and Tailwind CSS
